description:
This is a market on if the price of Polygon ($MATIC) will be above $0.600000 in USD on June 4, 2022 (12 PM ET).

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Polygon ($MATIC) has a candlestick closing price greater than $0.600000, per the resolution source, on June 4, 2022, 12 PM ET, and “No” otherwise.

The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/polygon).

This market will resolve according to the “C” (i.e. closing price) listed for the candle titled “Sat 04 June 2022, 12:00:00”, with the “Price” tab selected, in the Eastern Time Zone. Note, this 12:00:00 candle lists the opening price for 11:30:00 AM ET and the closing price for 12:00:00 PM ET.

The check will be after the relevant candle closes. If CoinGecko is unavailable, another credible source will be chosen.

markets.question: Will $MATIC be above $0.60 on June 4?
